subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Hoffman rallied from a three-shot deficit by closing with a five-under-par 66 for a one-shot victory over Shawn Stefani at the OHL Classic at Mayakoba in Playa del Carmen, Mexico.
snippet: Hoffman rallied from a three-shot deficit by closing with a five-under-par 66 for a one-shot victory over Shawn Stefani at the OHL Classic at Mayakoba in Playa del Carmen, Mexico.
